name: container
description: extends from widget, which provides a scrollable block for all supported mobile device.

data-attrs.name: cfg-scroll
data-attrs.description: Specify configuration for internal scrollView in JSON format.

data-attrs.name: full-height
data-attrs.description: Boolean indicating if the content size will scale to make the footer can fit to Container buttom.

data-attrs.name: translate3d
data-attrs.description: Boolean indicating if hardware acceleration in scrollview animation is enabled.

data-roles.name: header
data-roles.description: a header node in Container, which can be set to fixed or unfixed.

data-attrs.name: position
data-attrs.description: when set to 'fixed', the header node will be fixed on top of scrollview.

data-roles.name: body
data-roles.description: a body node in Container, which will be placed in scrollView.

data-roles.name: footer
data-roles.description: a footer node in Container, which can be set to fixed or unfixed.

data-attrs.name: position
data-attrs.description: when set to 'fixed', the footer node will be fixed on bottom of scrollview.

examples.name: example-basic
examples.description: Demonstrates basic usage of the Container Widget.

examples.name: example-fixed
examples.description: Use data-position="fixed" on header and footer to make their position fixed.
